WordBeater

A game created in Javascript to help improve your typing skills

Created using: HTML and Javascript


The player has 5 seconds to type the word on the screen. Each correct word awards a point and an additional second. To play again the user has to type the current word on the screen, the next word to be shown will count towards the score.
